/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The buildings in the background are tall and modern, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. A few cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
